Commands:
ABC time 
AAAA voice test records your voice and then replays it.  Start speaking when the repeater says "ready". 
Send CC followed by whatever tone you wish to test.
Notes: Bulletins from ARRL, Amateur Radio Newsline, Rain Report, Handiham and QSO today are transmitted all day Saturdays.
Nets: Mountain View Stake net: Sun at 20:00.
